infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: This app needs access to your location to find nearby fire stations and emergency services.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: This app needs access to your location to find nearby fire stations and emergency services.

plugins.locationAlwaysAndWhenInUsePermission: Allow $(PRODUCT_NAME) to use your location to find nearby fire stations and emergency services.
plugins.locationAlwaysPermission: Allow $(PRODUCT_NAME) to use your location to find nearby fire stations and emergency services.
plugins.locationWhenInUsePermission: Allow $(PRODUCT_NAME) to use your location to find nearby fire stations and emergency services.
